items.title: US offered Ukraine 15-year security guarantee, Zelensky says
items.description: The US and Ukrainian presidents both describe talks in Florida as "great" and "terrific" but the issue of territory remains "unresolved".

items.title: Trump to meet Netanyahu in Florida as focus turns to Middle East issues
items.description: They are set to discuss Iran, Lebanon, Syria and Gaza, where the Trump administration wants to see the ceasefire enter its second stage in January.

items.title: China holds military drills around Taiwan as warning to 'separatist forces'
items.description: The drills come days after the US announced the sale of one of its largest weapons packages to Taiwan.

items.title: Thailand accuses Cambodia of breaking newly signed ceasefire deal
items.description: The ceasefire took effect at noon local time (05:00 GMT) on Saturday.

items.title: John Simpson: 'I've reported on 40 wars but I've never seen a year like 2025'
items.description: It has been a year of multiple major conflicts - and there are geopolitical implications of unparalleled importance
